function factorial(n)
    n <= 1 ? 1 : n * factorial(n-1)
end

answer.content:
### Performance Tips:

| Tip | Reason |
|-----|--------|
| Type stability | Avoid changing types |
| Avoid globals | Scope matters |
| Pre-allocate | Avoid allocations |
| @inbounds | Skip bounds check |

explanation: **Type stability** is key to Julia performance.
